body:
sorry,I don't understand.
Shall we make a new file under /usr/local/cuda-8.0 named libdevice.10.bc
Or we move the libdevice.compute_50.10.bc under /usr/local/cuda&cuda-8.0/nvvm/libdevice to /usr/local/cuda-8.0 and rename it  libdevice.10.bc
